sentences: In a contact group, parties considered draft texts previously submitted by the EU and G-77/China, addressing whether text on the objective of monitoring capacity building should be preambular or operative.
Informal consultations were held over lunchtime in an attempt to reach consensus between the two groups.
However, back in the contact group this did not result in agreement, with the G-77/CHINA expressing frustration at the exclusion of some of the text from its proposal.
Regarding a proposed expert workshop in collaboration with the GEF, Co-Chair d'Auvergne noted that this idea had received considerable support at SBI 24.
However, several parties questioned the usefulness of such a meeting, and one party expressed concern that negotiations were moving backwards.
